item.title: About
item.description: Specialist in Distributed Secure Systems Currently I am currently working as IT Security Analyst at Verimi with significant contribution to the security of the digital identity offered by Verimi. Specifically, I am involved in security-, risk- & workflow-analyses as well as technology & architecture security (e.g. vulnerability scans, coordination of pentests). Verimi is unique worldwide and offers the chance of a secure digital identity and the sovereignty over his own data.

item.title: CV
item.description: Professional Experience With specialization in secure distributed systemsI gained experiences coordination, analysis, research & development activities in French, German and international institutes, all being international & multicultural environments: Since 10/2019: IT Security Analyst Verimi, Berlin, Germany Security & risk analyses, product security improvements (including vulnerability scanner, pentests coordination), security-relevant certifications & audits (e.g. eIDAS substantial part 2/3), raising awareness for IT security safety. 2018 – 2019: Head of IT Architecture Verimi, Berlin, Germany
